    public class Kafka08JsonTableSink
extends KafkaJsonTableSink
    Kafka 0.8 KafkaTableSink that serializes data in JSON format.

      Creates KafkaTableSink to write table rows as JSON-encoded records to a Kafka 0.8 topic with custom partition assignment.
      Kafka08JsonTableSink(java.lang.String topic, java.util.Properties properties, KafkaPartitioner<Row> partitioner)
      已过时。 
      This is a deprecated constructor that does not correctly handle partitioning when producing to multiple topics. Use Kafka08JsonTableSink(String, Properties, FlinkKafkaPartitioner) instead.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Kafka08JsonTableSink

        public Kafka08JsonTableSink(java.lang.String topic,
                            java.util.Properties properties)
        Creates KafkaTableSink to write table rows as JSON-encoded records to a Kafka 0.8 topic with fixed partition assignment.

        Each parallel TableSink instance will write its rows to a single Kafka partition.

        • If the number of Kafka partitions is less than the number of sink instances, different sink instances will write to the same partition.
        • If the number of Kafka partitions is higher than the number of sink instance, some Kafka partitions won't receive data.
        参数:
        topic - topic in Kafka to which table is written
        properties - properties to connect to Kafka

      • Kafka08JsonTableSink

        public Kafka08JsonTableSink(java.lang.String topic,
                            java.util.Properties properties,
                            FlinkKafkaPartitioner<Row> partitioner)
        Creates KafkaTableSink to write table rows as JSON-encoded records to a Kafka 0.8 topic with custom partition assignment.
        参数:
        topic - topic in Kafka to which table is written
        properties - properties to connect to Kafka
        partitioner - Kafka partitioner

      • Kafka08JsonTableSink

        @Deprecated
public Kafka08JsonTableSink(java.lang.String topic,
                                        java.util.Properties properties,
                                        KafkaPartitioner<Row> partitioner)
        已过时。 This is a deprecated constructor that does not correctly handle partitioning when producing to multiple topics. Use Kafka08JsonTableSink(String, Properties, FlinkKafkaPartitioner) instead.
        Creates KafkaTableSink to write table rows as JSON-encoded records to a Kafka 0.8 topic with custom partition assignment.
        参数:
        topic - topic in Kafka to which table is written
        properties - properties to connect to Kafka
        partitioner - Kafka partitioner

        protected FlinkKafkaProducerBase<Row> createKafkaProducer(java.lang.String topic,
                                                          java.util.Properties properties,
                                                          SerializationSchema<Row> serializationSchema,
                                                          FlinkKafkaPartitioner<Row> partitioner)
        从类复制的说明: KafkaTableSink
        Returns the version-specifid Kafka producer.
        指定者:
        createKafkaProducer 在类中 KafkaTableSink
        参数:
        topic - Kafka topic to produce to.
        properties - Properties for the Kafka producer.
        serializationSchema - Serialization schema to use to create Kafka records.
        partitioner - Partitioner to select Kafka partition.
        返回:
        The version-specific Kafka producer
